sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"破坏，损坏"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: break, destroy, ruin, wreck, damage, spoil
means: break ： 普通用词，指某物因被打破或撕破而受到破坏，可指有形或无形的破坏。
destroy ： 多指彻底地、毁灭性地破坏，含导致无用，不能或很难再修复的意味。
ruin ： 多指因外部原因而受到严重破坏或毁灭，侧重破坏的彻底性，也可用于引申意义。
wreck ： 侧重指船只、车辆、房屋等受到严重破坏或完全毁坏，也可指计划、健康受到损害。
damage ： 多指对无生命物体的损害，造成降低价值、破坏功能等后果。
spoil ： 强调不仅会削弱力量、精力或价值，而且会导致不可避免的毁灭。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"损害，伤害"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: hurt, injure, wound, harm, damage, disable
means: hurt ： 普通用词，较口语化，侧重指给有生命的东西造成机体上或精神、感情上的或轻或重的伤害。
injure较hurt正式，多用于有生命的事物。既可指伤害别人的事物。即可指伤害别人的健康、外貌、自尊心、名誉等，又可指使别人受伤或东西受损，同时含有受伤害部分至少暂时丧失功能的意味。
wound ： 专指对身体的重伤，尤指在战斗中受的伤，强调外部创伤；也可指精神方面的伤害。
harm ： 主要用于有生命的东西，语气略强于injure，指引起严重的痛苦和损伤；有时也用于抽象事物，指造成任何不良后果。
damage ： 通常指对无生命物体的损害，并有降低其价值，破坏其功能等的后果。

sentence.Network_en: It's a fair guess to say that the damage will be extensive.
sentence.Network_cn: 说损失会很严重想必猜得不错。

sentence.Network_en: The blast caused extensive damage, shattering the ground-floor windows.
sentence.Network_cn: 爆炸造成了巨大的破坏，震碎了一楼的窗户。

sentence.Network_en: The radiation can damage microprocessors and computer memories, causing them to malfunction.
sentence.Network_cn: 辐射会损坏微处理器和电脑内存，使之失灵。

jx.jx_en_mean: used to indicate that it is too late to prevent the occurrence of something unfortunate or undesirable
(informal, humorous)used to ask the cost of something

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, from dam, damne 'loss or damage', from Latin damnum 'loss or hurt'; compare with damn

entry.def: To damage an object means to break it, spoil it physically, or stop it from working properly.

example.ex: He maliciously damaged a car with a baseball bat...
example.tran: 他用棒球棒恶意损毁了一辆汽车。

example.ex: The sun can damage your skin.

entry.def: To damage something means to cause it to become less good, pleasant, or successful.

example.ex: Jackson doesn't want to damage his reputation as a political personality...
example.tran: 杰克逊不想损害自己政界名人的声誉。

example.ex: He warned that the action was damaging the economy.
example.tran: 他警告说该行动正对经济造成破坏。

entry.def: Damage is physical harm that is caused to an object.

example.ex: The blast caused extensive damage to the house...
example.tran: 爆炸给这所房子造成了大面积的损坏。

example.ex: Many professional boxers end their careers with brain damage.
example.tran: 许多职业拳击手结束运动生涯时都已受到了脑损伤。

entry.tran: （对人、情况、行为的）损害，伤害，不良影响
entry.def: Damage consists of the unpleasant effects that something has on a person, situation, or type of activity.

example.ex: Incidents of this type cause irreparable damage to relations with the community...
example.tran: 这类事件会对与该社群的关系造成不可弥合的伤害。

example.ex: Adhering to the new rules meant inflicting serious damage on motor racing.
example.tran: 遵守新的规定就意味着赛车比赛将遭受严重影响。

entry.def: If a court of law awards damages to someone, it orders money to be paid to them by a person who has damaged their reputation or property, or who has injured them.

example.ex: He was vindicated in court and damages were awarded.
example.tran: 他在法庭上被证明无罪，并且获得了损害赔偿金。

entry.tran: 事已至此;已造成的损害无法挽回
entry.def: If you say 'the damage is done', you mean that it is too late now to prevent the harmful effects of something that has already happened.

example.ex: Once the damage is done, even modern surgery can't undo it entirely.
example.tran: 伤害一旦造成，即使是现代外科手术也无法将其完全消除。

means.word_mean: 1. the occurrence of a change for the worse
3. the act of damaging something or someone
4. the amount of money needed to purchase something;

sentences.sentence: "he got his new car on excellent terms"

means.word_mean: 5. a legal injury is any damage resulting from a violation of a legal right

sentences.sentence: "She damaged the car when she hit the tree"

example.en: As soon as I pay the damage. we can go.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 名词或动词后缀,表示"状态,总称"; 2. [做的]状态,过程; 3. 名词后缀,表示"费用"; 4. 名词后缀,表示"场所,物品"

stems_affixes.word_buile: dam+age状态,总称→n.损害,伤害
carry携带,运送+age费用→carriage运费
post邮件+age费用→n.邮资
rail铁路+age费用→n.铁路运输,铁路运费
tow拖+age费用→n.拖[船,车]费
water水+age费用→n.水路运输,水运费
anchor铁锚+age场所,物品→n.停泊地点;抛锚地点
append附加+age表示名词→n.附加物
bever饮,喝+age场所,物品→n.[水,酒等之外的]饮料
cot小床,小屋+age场所→cottage村舍,小屋
herit继承+age场所,物品→n.遗产,继承物;传统
hermit隐居士+age场所,物品→n.隐居处
lug拖拉+age物品→需要拖运的物品→luggage行李,皮箱
vill茅屋+age场所,物品→n.村,村庄
wreck残骸+age场所,物品→n.残骸,碎片

stems_affixes.value_cn: 优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad+vant=van前卫,先锋+age状态,总称→n.优点,长处,有利条件;利益,好处
dot打点,打盹+age状态,总称→n.老年糊涂,溺爱
drain排干+age状态,总称→n.排水;下水道
foli叶+age状态,总称→n.叶子[总称]
marry结婚+age状态,总称→marriage
mile英里+age状态,总称→n.里程
patron赞助人+age状态,总称→n.赞助,惠顾
percent百分比+age状态,总称→n.百分率
pilgrim朝圣+age状态,总称→n.朝圣
short短+age状态,总称→n.不足,缺乏
ton吨+age状态,总称→tonnage吨位
verbi=verb词语+age状态,总称→词的状态→冗长
vis看+age状态,总称→n.脸,面貌
pill抢夺+age状态,总称→n.&v.抢劫,掠夺
en进入+vis看+age[做的]状态→进入看的状态

Sentence.sentence: Oh, that's the cover you in case you damage the hire car.
Third party insurance only covers you for damage two another vehicle
But the damage to skill and craftsmanship- that's needed to build a complex airliner or a tractor, or for a worker to move up from assembler to machinist to supervisor - went largely unnoticed.

means.word_mean: 损害, 毁坏, 加害于

sentences.en: Wool usually damages if washed in hot water.
sentences.cn: 毛织物用热水洗一定会受 损。

sentences.en: You've damaged my bicycle.You shan't have it again.
sentences.cn: 你把我的自行车弄坏了。你别想再用了。

sentences.en: Hailstones damaged crops and even killed farm animals.
sentences.cn: 冰雹毁坏了农作物, 甚至打死了牲畜。

sentences.en: A fire has damaged the school houses.
sentences.cn: 一场大火毁坏了学校的房子 。

sentences.en: The bomb destroyed two buildings and damaged several others.
sentences.cn: 炸弹炸毁了两幢建筑物, 炸坏了另外几幢房屋。

sentences.en: Drinking and smoking can damage your health.
sentences.cn: 饮酒和吸烟会损害你的健康。

sentences.en: They shot down or damaged about 10 enemy planes.
sentences.cn: 他们击落击伤大约10架敌机。

sentences.en: He tried to use it to damage our international reputation.
sentences.cn: 他企图利用此事来破坏我们的国际声誉。

sentences.en: Their failures in this area have damaged their self-confidence and creditability.
sentences.cn: 他们在这一领域的失败使他们的自信心和可信度受损。

sentences.en: This lock is damaged.This door will never open!
sentences.cn: 这把锁坏了。门打不开了！

sentences.en: Many houses were damaged by the earthquake.
sentences.cn: 许多房屋在地震中遭到毁坏。

sentences.en: If men breathed in the fine paint spray, their lungs would be damaged.
sentences.cn: 如果人们吸入这种细微的漆雾, 他们的肺部就会受到损伤。

sentences.en: Her heart was slightly damaged as a result of her long illness.
sentences.cn: 久病使她的心脏受到一些损伤。

sentences.en: The police acknowledged that three police vehicles were damaged.
sentences.cn: 警方承认有三辆警车被毁。

sentences.en: His political reputation was damaged due to his illegal marriage.
sentences.cn: 他的政治名誉由于他的非法婚姻而受到诋毁。

jushi.english: Wool usually damages if washed in hot water.
jushi.chinese: 毛织物用热水洗一定会受损。
